pages.text: $(key)Spawners$() no longer spawn forever. They have a $(key)"Remaining Spawn Count"$(); when it hits zero, they stop and $(bold)self-destruct$().$(br2)Naturally generated $(key)Spawners$() start at $(bold)20$().$(br2)Use $(mage/spell#summon)Spell Summon$() to $(bold)reset$() the remaining spawn count.

When a $(key)Spawner$() is $(bold)manually$() broken, it drops a $(key)Spawner Soul$(), which is an important crafting material for some items.$(br2)You can also use a $(key)Spawner Soul$() as an $(bold)key item$() for $(mage/spell#summon)Spell Summon$() to put it back into a $(key)Spawner$().
